recipe.title: Mirliton Relish
ingredients: 3 1/2 pounds chayote squash (about 6 large), peeled, seeded, cut into 1/3-inch dice (8 cups)
instructions: Combine all ingredients in large bowl; toss to blend. Season generously with salt and pepper. Cover and chill at least 2 hours, tossing occasionally. (Can be prepared 8 hours ahead. Keep refrigerated.)
